welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Wood Green, a charming and bustling city known for its vibrant markets and rich cultural diversity. We hope you enjoy your stay and take some time to explore all that our city has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at London City Airport offers a modern and efficient travel experience for passengers.

terminals.name: Private Jet Terminal
terminals.description: For those traveling by private jet, London City Airport offers a dedicated terminal with luxurious amenities and services.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Northolt Airport handles all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Northolt Airport caters to VIP and executive travelers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The original terminal at Heathrow, now used for domestic and European flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The newest terminal at Heathrow, used for international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The oldest terminal at Heathrow, used for long-haul flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: The second largest terminal at Heathrow, used for international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: The largest terminal at Heathrow, used for British Airways and Iberia flights.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available for 45 minutes, with options for paid upgrades.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Biggin Hill Airport handles all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Jet Terminal
terminals.description: The private jet terminal at Biggin Hill Airport is exclusively for private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Luton Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Luton Airport, mainly used for budget airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Gatwick Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The secondary terminal at Gatwick Airport, primarily serving international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, with a premium option for faster speeds.
